CMenuNav.Title: 2: Communicating at BYU-Idaho
CMenuNav.Description: Learn how to use your myBYUI student portal
CMenuNav.BodyCopy:
Check out the top of the page!

This is your student portal to communications, learning, and services on campus. Click on the blue tabs to access the features of myBYUI.

Student Tab

You can find your class schedule, academic summary, grade reports, and you can register for classes.

Finances

Your finances account will show your payments due, money received, and current balance. You can also access your financial aid information, make payments, and more.

  • bursar@byui.edu
  • (208) 496-1900
Email

Here you have access to your BYUI email account and address book with the contact information for BYUI Faculty.

I-Learn

I-Learn is an online tool used by professors for coursework. You can access class assignments, announcements, and grades from the I-Learn tab.

*If you ever have any issues with myBYUI check the help-desk button below.
